page.description: Lookup values in a table and fill-in fields in the current row from fields in the Lookup Table.

section.description: Used with the Grid and UX components

item.name: Lookup source type
item.description: Specify if the data is retrieved from a native DBF table or a SQL database table (AlphaDAO)

item.name: Connection string
item.description: Specify the connection string for the AlphaDAO datasource.

item.name: Linking fields
item.description: Specify the linking field. The linking fields determine how to find the matching record in the Lookup Table. The fill-in values will be returned from the matching record.

item.name: Overwrite existing data
item.description: Specify if the lookup should overwrite existing data in any of the fill-in fields, or preserve the existing data. Choices include *[ui:Overwrite]*, *[ui:Preserve]*.

item.name: Not found action
item.description: If the lookup record is not found, what should happen? Choices include.

item.name: Not found Javascript Function
item.description: Specify the name of the Javascript function to execute if the lookup record is not found.
